instruction.en: Press and hold the button until the red licht starts blinking, and then release
instruction.nl: Houd de knop ingedrukt tot het rode lichtje begint te knipperen en laat dan los

label.en: Destination routine enabled

hint.en: Enables an internal routine that periodically checks the Z-Wave device in association group 2 by sending a test message. If transmission fails, the AlarmSound will notify the user with a sound. (See also configuration param 3, 4 and 9).

label.en: routine is disabled
routine is enabled
Select index sound/light mode

hint.en: The index of the sound mode when a switch binary/basic set frame is received.

label.en: Power offline sound/light mode

hint.en: The index of the sound mode the AlarmSound will start when it is unplugged. Use number zero (0) to disable, 1-6 to select sound/light mode number.

label.en: Error (Destination Routine Failed) sound/light mode

hint.en: The index of the sound mode the AlarmSound will play when it is unable to reach the device in association group 2. Use number zero (0) to disable, 1-6 to select sound/light mode number.

instruction.en: Press and hold the button on your BeNext P1 Dongle for three seconds
instruction.nl: Druk en hou de knop op de BeNext P1 Dongle vast voor drie seconden

label.en: HW pullup

hint.en:
It is possible to provide a pullup to your smart meter.
Range: 0 - 1
hint.nl:
Het is mogelijk om een pullup aan te bieden aan uw slimme meter.
Bereik: 0 - 1
